Key Match Events: South Africa won by 5 wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Lungi Ngidi's first 2.3 overs cost 19 runs and removed India's openers
Suryakumar Yadav scored 53 runs and became the highest run-scorer in T20I cricket in 2022
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's win has big implications for the rest of the group, particularly Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a fast and bouncy pitch
Others: India made one change from their previous XI, with Axar Patel out and Deepak Hooda in
